title: Deliramenta catarrhi: or, The incongruities, impossibilities, and absurdities couched under the vulgar opinion of defluxions. The author, that great philosopher, by fire, Joh. Bapt. Van Helmont, &c. The translator and paraphrast Dr. Charleton, physician to the late King.
author: Helmont, Jean Baptiste van, 1577-1644.
publisher: Printed by E.G. for William Lee at the signe of the Turks-head in Fleet-street,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
